document.full_text: yoko hashiguchi and her toddler fled tokyo after a deadly earthquake and tsunami devastated northeast japan and triggered a nuclear disaster at a power plant 240 km (150 miles) away.
document.title: tokyo tiptoes toward normality as disaster effect lingers
lines_and_colors: yoko hashiguchi and her toddler fled tokyo after a deadly earthquake and tsunami devastated northeast japan and triggered a nuclear disaster at a power plant 240 km (150 miles) away.
